title: Invasion of the boneseed plants
creator_credit: Peter Nagels and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Looks at the boneseed plant, a noxious weed that threatens native flora and fauna and is spreading at an alarming rate. Narrated by Tony Evans.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Nagels and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
